root.name: The Adventures of Lomax
root.description: OverviewLomax is a spin-off of the Lemmings series. Players take control of a lemming called Lomax; Lomas is tasked with saving his friends who were transformed into monsters by an evil doctor, Evil Ed. Players have to stop him using a magical helmet. Players can use some of the power-ups from Lemmings series including building and digging. When players defeat enemies, they will turn into a normal lemming.The Adventures of Lomax was released in 1996 for both PC and PlayStation.
